title: DIAGNOSTIC ACCURACY OF MODIFIED ALVARADO SCORE IN THE DIAGNOSIS OF ACUTE APPENDICITIS KEEPING HISTOPATHOLOGY AS GOLD STANDARD
details: S Syed, A Khan - Journal of Medical & Health Sciences Review, 2025
abstract: The purpose of this study was to assess the performance of the Modified Alvarado Score (MAS) for diagnosing acute appendicitis against histopathology as the reference standard. Acute appendicitis is one of the most frequent surgical …
